doc:
/** * Is a FUNCTION node an function expression? An function expression is one * that has either no name or a name that is not added to the current scope. * *

Some examples of function expressions: * 

   * (function () {})
   * (function f() {})()
   * [ function f() {} ]
   * var f = function f() {};
   * for (function f() {};;) {}
   *
* *

Some examples of functions that are not expressions: * 

   * function f() {}
   * if (x); else function f() {}
   * for (;;) { function f() {} }
   *
* * @param n A node * @return Whether n is an function used within an expression. */
